name: TeacherSimulator
description:
In TeacherSimulator you will get first-hand experience on how it is to be a teacher. But not the boring parts, oh no! You will be responsible for doing what teachers like most: Collecting phones from (innocent) students. Build an everlasting empire by selling phones and building security cameras to bust even more students!

IMPORTANT: TeacherSimulator is a game which was made as a joke for a specific school. It, therefore, includes many references to events that won't be understood by the general public.

IMPORTANT: The ingame-text is german, the game is not localized. The German text isn't gameplay-relevant, but mostly jokes/running gags though.

INFO: The game was initially developed as a mobile game. If you want to, you can play it on android as well.
